text: Saúl Lorenzo Rivero Rocha (23 July 1954 – 2 July 2022)Saúl Rivero, DT del Progreso campeón uruguayo en 1989, falleció este sábado was a Uruguayan football player and manager. He played as a midfielder. Rivero made nine appearances for the Uruguay national team from 1974 to 1976. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Footballers from Montevideo
title: Saúl Rivero
